Dating: ROMAN PERIOD (not after); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD; PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not before)
Name: Hathor capital
Description: This capital has the face of the goddess Hathor on each of its four sides. She is shown with cow's ears and a heavy wig which is decorated with ribbons and two rosettes. On top of the capital was once a separately modelled extension shaped as a naos. The shaft of the column has been lost.
